title: BlueBird Block-2 Mission: ISRO Successfully Launches LVM3-M6 Rocket
excerpt: ISRO's BlueBird Block-2 mission marked a significant milestone with the successful launch of the LVM3-M6 rocket. This launch demonstrates ISRO's continued advancements in space technology and its commitment to expanding satellite capabilities.
metaDescription: Discover how ISRO's BlueBird Block-2 mission successfully launched the LVM3-M6 rocket, advancing India's space exploration and satellite technology.
author: WebKoya Team
